Name: Semantic Segment
Description: A segment is used to create a grouping of related content.

Definitions.Vertical Segment: A vertical segment divides content vertically
Definitions.Horizontal Segment: A horizontal segment divides content horizontally
Definitions.Piled: A segment can be formatted to look like a pile of pages
Definitions.Stacked: A segment can be formatted to show it contains multiple pages
Definitions.Disabled:
A segment may show its content is disabled

Definitions.Inverted: A segment can have its colors inverted for contrast
Definitions.Raised: A segment may be formatted to raise above the page.
Definitions.Ordinality: A segment can be formatted to appear more or less noticeable
Definitions.Floated: A segment cant sit to the left or right of other content
Definitions.Basic: A basic segment has no special formatting
Definitions.Attached: A segment can be attached to other content on a page
